name: Paras Mehta
body:
### Hi!
I am a PhD candidate at the Databases and Information Systems working group at Freie Universitaet Berlin. My supervisor is [Prof. Agnès Voisard](http://page.mi.fu-berlin.de/voisard/desktop.html). You can reach me through [email](mailto:paras.mehta@fu-berlin.de), [LinkedIn](http://de.linkedin.com/in/pmehtaeu) or at the following address:

Institute of Computer Science, Freie Universitaet Berlin  
Room 170, Takustr. 9  
14195 Berlin  
Tel: +49 30 838 75108  

### Research
My PhD is on the application of user generated geospatial data for targeting and personalization of crime alerts. My research interests lie in querying of spatio-textual and spatio-temporal data, mobile crowdsourcing systems and user modeling for content personalization.  

### Thesis Proposals
Currently open proposals for Masters Thesis with me: 
+ [Implementation and evaluation of an improved spatial keyword index](http://www.mi.fu-berlin.de/en/inf/groups/ag-db/Theses/spatial_keyword_index/index.html)

### Previous Work
+ May 2015 – till date: Research Assistant in European project [City.Risks] (http://cityrisks.eu) at Databases and Information Systems group, FU Berlin.

+ Oct 2011 – Sep 2014: Research Assistant in European project with the [Marie Curie](http://ec.europa.eu/research/mariecurieactions/) fellowship [GEOCROWD] (http://www.geocrowd.eu) at Databases and Information Systems group, FU Berlin.

+ Jan-Sep 2011: Senior Software Engineer, 
Jun 2008-Dec 2010: Software Engineer at [Consult Hyperion](http://www.chyp.com/), Guildford, UK. 

+ Aug-Sep 2007: Summer Intern at [Indra Sistemas] (http://www.indracompany.com/en), Madrid, Spain.

+ Jan-Mar 2006: Trainee at Flextronics Software Systems (now [Aricent](http://www.aricent.com/)), India.

+ Jun-Jul 2005: Research Intern at [Robotic Intelligence Lab](http://robinlab.uji.es/), Jaume-I University, Spain.

### Education
+ Oct 2006 – Mar 2008: Master of Science (MSc) in Computer Science jointly awarded by University of Reading (UK), Universidad Carlos III de Madrid (Spain), and Aristotle University of Thessaloniki (Greece).
  + Recipient of [Erasmus Mundus](http://eacea.ec.europa.eu/erasmus_mundus/) scholarship from the European Commission.
  + First position in the class with grade A with distinction. 
  + Dissertation: [Study of security mechanisms for secure mobile commerce architecture through the development of a mobile banking application](pdf/MScdissertation.pdf) with [Prof. Mario Muñoz Organero](http://www.it.uc3m.es/mario/indice.html).

+ Aug 2002 – Jun 2006: Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) in Electronics and Communication, Delhi College of Engineering (now [Delhi Technological University](http://www.dce.edu/)), India.

+ Mehta, Paras, Agnès Voisard, and Sebastian Müller. [Clustering Spatial Data Streams for Targeted Alerting in Disaster Response.](http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2534307). In Proceedings of the 4th ACM SIGSPATIAL International Workshop on GeoStreaming (IWGS) 2013. ACM.

+ Mehta, P., Voisard, A. (2012). [Analysis of User Mobility Data Sources for Multi-User Context Modeling](http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2442955). In Proceedings of the First ACM SIGSPATIAL International Workshop on Crowdsourced and Volunteered Geographic Information. ACM.
